content:
That's a great idea! Geotagging and using relevant hashtags will definitely help your post reach a wider audience.

As for sharing a photo of Luna, I think it's a fantastic idea! It's a fun way to tie in your "Cat Lovers Unite" community with your hiking adventure. It'll also add a personal touch to your post and make it more engaging. People love animals, and a cute cat in hiking gear is sure to bring a smile to their faces!

You could even consider creating a fun caption like: "Luna's not joining me on this hike, but she's always with me in spirit! Who else has a furry friend that loves the great outdoors? Share your own pet's outdoor adventures in the comments below!"

By doing so, you'll not only get engagement from your hiking community but also from your "Cat Lovers Unite" community, making it a great way to bridge the two interests.

Remember to keep the focus of your post on your hiking adventure, but the addition of Luna's photo will add a fun and personal touch. Good luck, and I hope you get lots of engagement on your post!
